queries.select: select history_id , DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as EXP_DTM , path as ENG_RT_ID , source_company , source_plant , sink_company , sink_plant , energy_category , volume as EXP_AMT , unit from iae_steam_prediction where history_id > $history_id order by history_id

select history_id , DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as EXP_DTM , path as ENG_RT_ID , source_company , source_plant , sink_company , sink_plant , energy_category , volume as EXP_AMT , unit from iae_air_compressed_prediction where history_id > $history_id order by history_id
